name: Billy Basement
description:
A short underground adventure game made for MiniJam 57.

Billy has discovered a massive area beneath his basement, and is determined to plunder it of its treasure.

Resources used:

Sprites: https://canarigames.itch.io/canaripack-8bit-topdown

Font: https://www.fontspace.com/barcade-brawl-font-f31534

Some code and a lot of guidance:  https://nluqo.github.io/broughlike-tutorial/
